messages:
Name: Serdar Gurler
Nationality: Turkey
Date of Birth: September 14, 1991
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Antalyaspor
Süper Lig clubs played for: Elazığspor, Trabzonspor, Kayseri Erciyesspor, Gençlerbirliği, Ankaraspor, Göztepe, Antalyaspor

Serdar Gurler, the Antalyaspor midfielder, has not appeared in a great number of the club's Süper Lig games in 2020/2021, making 15 appearances overall and accumulating 346 minutes of playing time. He has started in three of these appearances across their 40 fixtures and been mostly used as a substitute on 12 occasions.
Gurler last appeared in an Süper Lig game on May 8, playing just 10 minutes for Antalyaspor against Trabzonspor in a 2-1 defeat.
Last season for Göztepe, Gurler made 26 Süper Lig appearances, scored seven goals and provided five assists.
Gurler linked up with Antalyaspor in August 2020 from Huesca, for whom he made 13 league appearances in total, providing one assist.
